await SPayLater.registerCustomer("0xaCA96853E0d2850300Df425Ce01230BF9A381FC2");
await SPayLater.getCustomerInfo("0xaCA96853E0d2850300Df425Ce01230BF9A381FC2");
const SPayLater = await ethers.getContractAt("SPayLater", "0x9c261CcE46BCD0bd29D75A704267838C43C1cc74");
await deployer.getBalance();
const [deployer] = await ethers.getSigners();
